223a3: thams cad yongs su spangs na sems can thams cad kyis bkur zhing bla mar byed pa dang / tshig tu smra ba kun la pha rol po kun dga' zhing nyan pas ngogs pa med par 'gyur te/ de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
223a4: yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor ba 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'bying ba yang zhe gcod pa'i tshig gi dbang gis lus dang / ngag dang / yid mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la/
223a5: gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing mthong ba dang thos pa'i rjes su yi rang ba las byung ba nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / sems can gyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / shin tu dul ba la bsgrib pas bsgribs par gyur
223a6: to/ / 'di ltar zhe gcod pa'i tshig yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par yongs su bcom pa'i dbang gis rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi len te/ lus 'di nyid la yang lha dang mi lasarba/
223a7: pa kun dga' bas dogs pa mi skye ba dang / lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang / tshig tu smra ba thams cad pha rol gyi yid du 'ong ba dang snyan par 'gyur ro// nam 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na yang lus dang sems la
223a8: sdug bsngal gis mi gdung zhing nyon mi mongs pa dang / yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang chung ma dang 'khor thams cad kyis yongs su bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed par 'gyur gyi shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i phonya
223b1: mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ / yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang / yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang / de la bkur
223b2: sti dang bcas pas shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro/ / tshe 'phos kyang phyir ma'i nang du skyes na yang dbang po yongs su rdzogs shing yan lag dang ldan pa dang / gang nas gang du skyes par tshig 'jam por smra ba dang / byang
223b3: gzugs bzad pa dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang / phyir yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/ tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing
223b4: yang dag pa dang phrad de de'i rjes su slob pa dang / zhe gcod pa'i tshig yongs su spong ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su gcod pa dang / dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa
223b5: dang / theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa thams cad rim gyis gzhol zhing shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes rgya mtshol 'jug pa nas bla na med kyi/
223b6: byang chub kyi bar du 'thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing na yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra thams cad dang bral te/ yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang / chos kyi sgras zhing de yongs su gang ba dang / dran
223b7: pa dang blo gros su ldan pa/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs can/ shin tu dul ba'i sems can dag zhing der skye ba dang / rtag tu tshig 'jam pos gcig la gcig bskul bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag
223b8: tu med de/ sems can dag cis 'dul ba bzhin du chos ston pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing / sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed par 'gyur
224a1: de/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi gcod pa'i tshig yongs su sod pa'i 'khor lo drug pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di dang ldan pas nyan thas
224a2: kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med
224a3: par 'gyur ro/ / theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongs su 'phel ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la
224a4: rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam/ chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung chung ngun chos gos kyi chal bu gyon cing sgra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar
224a5: zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang / rno ba'i shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /
224a6: rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / chos bres
224a7: pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa dang smon lam rnam pa sna
224a8: tshogs kyis sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gzhan dag thob pa yang ji gad bshad pa bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam mtsho'i bar du tshig kyal ba
224b1: yongs su spangs pas sems can thams cad kyis bkur zhing bla mar byed pa dang / tshig tu smra ba thams cad don du 'gyur zhing tshig thos pa rnams nyan cing dgus pas dogs pa med par 'gyur ro// de'i dbang rigs dge ba'i
224b2: rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor bar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'byed pa yang tshig kyal ba smra ba'i dbang gis lus dang / ngag dang / yid mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang
224b3: byed la/ gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing mthong ba dang thos pa'i rjes su yid rang ba la si blang ba'i nyin mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / sems can gyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / don du sgrub la sgrib pas skabs par gyur to// 'di
224b4: ltar tshig kyal ba yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor les lhag ma ma lus par yongs su bcom pas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi len par byed de/ / lus 'di nyid la lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dga' zheng yid du 'ong bas dog
224b5: pa med par 'gyur ba dang / lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang / tshig du smra ba thams cad don du gnyer ba dang / 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na yang las dang sems la sdug bsngal gyis mi gang shing yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang /
224b6: chung ma dang / 'khor gyis yongs su btung bas chi 'pho pa'i dus byed par 'gyur gyi shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i po nya mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dral ba/ rnas khrims
224b7: da son tan du ldan pa bsod rnams kyi ning yang dag pa dang phrad de las dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang / de la bkyer ste dang bcas shing shin tu dad pa skye par 'gyur ro// tshe 'phos nas kyang byid mo'i nang du skye zhing dang
224b8: po yongs su rdzogs pa yan lag dang ldan pa dang / gang nas gang du skyes par phan pa dang / don du 'gyur ba'i tshig smra ba dang / byad gzugs bzang ba dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / rab tu bde zhir skyed pa dang / phyir
225a1: yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/ tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad pa de'i rjes su slob pa dang / tshig kyal bar smra ba yongs su
225a2: spong ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su gcod pa dang / dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad chel ba dang / byang chub sem
225a3: dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa thams cad la rim gyis gzhol zhing shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing don med pa'i tshig thams
225a4: cad dang bral te byang chub sems dpa' sde snod du gtogs pa'i chos chen po'i sgra mchog dam pa rnam pa mang pos zhing de yongs su khyab pa dang / dpag tu med pa'i smon lam dang / ye shes dam pa phun sum tshogs pas chos
225a5: kyi don rnam pa sna tshogs 'chad pa la mkhas pa'i sems can de lta bu dag zhing der skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de/ sems can dag cis 'dul ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston
225a6: to/ / yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing / sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
225a7: tshig kyal pa yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor lo bdun pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di dang ldan pas nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul
225a8: pa med par 'gyur ro/ / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po
225b1: gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/ / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongs su 'phel ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam/ chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung
225b2: chung ngu na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing sgra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ / theg pa chen po la chos la kong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang / rno ba'i shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi khyad
225b3: bar rtag du skye zhing 'phel ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / sa rnams thas yad 'dab du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang / rtag
225b4: tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed par
225b5: mi 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i rtsab thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa dang smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems mi ngoms par 'thur te/ 'bras bu gzhan thob pa yang dza
225b6: skad bshad pa bzhin no/ / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam mtsho'i bar du chags sems yongs su spangs na/ sems can thams cad kyis bkur zhing btsun par byed pa dang
225b7: sems rnam par dag cing rnyog pa dang thal te/ de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor bar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'byung ba yang chags
225b8: sems kyi dbang gis lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la gzhan yang byang du 'dzud cing mthong ba dang thos pa'i rjes su yi rang ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / sems
226a1: can gyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / 'dod sems med pa la sgrib pas sgribs par 'gyur ro// 'dod sems yongs su spang ba'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par yongs su bcom pas rnam par smin
226a2: pa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi len te/ lus 'di nyid la yang lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba dang / dogs pa med par 'gyur ba dang / lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang / sems rnam par dag cing rnyog pa dang /
226a3: bral bar 'gyur ro// 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na yang lus dang sems la sdug bsngal gyis mi gdung ba dang / yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang chung ma dang / 'khor gyis yongs su bskor bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur gyi/ shin
226a4: tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ / yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/ tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ lus dang sems
226a5: rab tu dga' ba dang / de la bkur sti dang bcas pas shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir mi'i nang du skye zhing dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa/ yan lag dang ldan pa/ gang nas gang du skyes par sems rnam
226a6: par dag cing rnyog pa med pa dang / byad gzugs bzang ba dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang / phyir yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang / yon tan du ldan pa
226a7: bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de de'i rjes su slob pa dang / chags sems yongs su spang ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos yongs su gcad pa dang / dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
226a8: theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa thams cad la rim gyis gzhol zhing shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas bla na med
226b1: ba'i byang chub 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing lag mthil bzhin du mnyam pa rin po che rnam pa mang pos yongs su gang ba dang / rin po che'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs dkrigs pa dang / rin po che'i gos dang / rin
226b2: po che'i brgyan gyis yo byad dang / rin po che'i rkyen mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs dang / gser dang / dngul dang / mu tig gi dra ba dang / shing la sogs pas yongs su gang ba dang / shin tu yid du 'ong zhing blta na sdug pa/
226b3: nga rgyal yongs su sbyangs pa/ byang gzugs shin tu mdzes pa dang / dbang po mnyams pa/ sems mnyam pa'i sems can dag zhing der skye bar 'gyur te/ chags sems med pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pas
226b4: brgyan par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de/ sems can dag cis 'dul ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston to// yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas
226b5: shing sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chags sems yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor lo brgyad pa'o// byang chub sems
226b6: dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di dang ldanan nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'phrul pa med par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul ba me par
226b7: 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur// theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung
226b8: yongs su 'phel ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab du byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi sdod dam/ chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung chung ngun chos gos kyi tshul bu gyon cing sgra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med
227a1: par 'gyur ro/ / theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang / rno ba'i shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang bzod
227a2: padang / sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing rjes su 'thun par 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing / byang chub
227a3: sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson
227a4: pas mi ngoms pa/ byang chub kyi spyod pa dang smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gzhan dag thob pa yang ji skad bshad pa bzhin no// // bam po dgu pa// rigs kyi bu
227a5: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam mtsho'i bar du gnod sems yongs su spangs na/ sems can thams cad kyis bkur zhing bla mar byed pa dang / sems rnam par dag pa dang / dri ma dang bral
227a6: bar 'gyur te/ de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thog ma med pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor bar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'bying ba yang gnod sems kyi dbang gis lus dang /
227a7: ngag dang / yid kyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing mthong ba dang thos pa'i rjes su yid rang ba las byung ba nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / sems can gyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa da
227a8: gnod sems med pa la sgrib pas sgribs par gyur to/ / 'di ltar gnod sems yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par yongs su bcom pas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi len te/ lus//
227b1: 'di nyid la yang lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dag zhing yid du 'ang ba dang / dogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems rnam par dag pa dang / dri ma dang bral bar 'gyur ro// 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na yang lus dang sems la sdug bsngal
227b2: gyis mi gdung zhing yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang / chung ma dang / 'khor thams cad kyis yongs su bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed par 'gyur gyi/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// yid du 'ong ba'i
227b3: dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/ tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang / de la bkur sti dang bcas pas shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro// /
227b4: tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir mi'i nang du skye zhing dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yan lag dang ldan pa dang / gang nas gang du skyes par sems rnam par dag cing dri ma dang bral ba dang / byad gzugs bzang ba dang / yid gzhungs
227b5: pa dang / rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang / phyir yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge bI bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/ tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de de'i rjes su 'thun par slob pa dang / gnod/
227b6: sems yongs su spong ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su gcod pa dang / dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang //
227b7: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang / spyod pa thams cad rim gyis gzhol zhing shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnyog pa dang /
227b8: spro ba dang / sprin dang khug rlangs dang / rdul dang dri ma dang / mi sdug pa dang mi mdzes pa thams cad dang bral te/ rin po che mang pos shin tu brgyan pa yid du 'ong ba dang / nga rgyal dang bral ba/ gzugs mdzes shing sdug pa/ dbang po
228a1: mnyams pa/ sems rtag tu zhi ba'i sems can dag zhing der skye ste/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / yon tan phun sum tshogs pas brgyan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med de/
228a2: sems can dag cis 'dul ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston to// yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro// rigs
228a3: kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnod sems yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor lo dgu pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul
228a4: pa med par 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// theg pa
228a5: chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongs su 'phel ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi
228a6: snod dam/ chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung chung ngun chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing sgra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po'i ches la gong nas gong du 'bar zhi daphyir mi ldog pa dang / rnga ba'i
228a7: shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang
228a8: phrad cing de'i rjes su slob pa dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge
228b1: bdun la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems mi ngoms pa dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa dang smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems
228b2: mi ngoms par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gzhan dag thob pa yang ji skad bstan pa bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang na mo mtsho'i bar du log par blta ba yongs su spangs na
228b3: sems can thams cad kyis bkur zhing bla mar byed pa dang / sems rnam par dag cing log par rtog pa dang bral bar 'gyur te/ de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thog ma med
228b4: pa'i mtha' nas chung lngar 'khor bar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'byung ba yang log par ltung ba'i dbang gis lus dang / ngag dang / yid sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la gzhan yang byed du 'jug cing mthong ba dang
228b5: thos pa'i rjes su yid rang ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / sems can gyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / yang dag par lta ba la sgrib pas bsgribs par gyur to// 'di ltar log par lta ba yongs su
228b6: spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par bcom pas/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yongs su mi len te/ lus 'di nyid la yang lha dang mi la sogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba dang / dogs pa med par 'gyur
228b7: ba dang / lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang / sems rnam par dag cing log par lta ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro// 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na yang lus dang sems la sdug bsngal gyis mi gdung zhing yid du 'ong ba'i
228b8: bu dang chung ma dang / 'khor thams cad kyis yongs su bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed par 'gyur gyi/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// yid du 'ang ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos
229a1: kyis dul ba/ tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang / bkur sti dang bcas pas shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'phos
229a2: nas kyang phyir mi'i nang du skye zhing dbang po yongs su rdzogs par yan lag dang ldan pa/ gang nas gang du skyes par sems rnam par dag cing log par lta ba dang / bral ba dang / byang gzugs bzang ba dang / yid
229a3: gzhungs pa dang / rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang / phyir yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba/ tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de de'i rjes su 'thun
229a4: par slob pa dang / log par blta ba'i chos yongs su spong ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su gcod pa dang / dge ba'i chos byed par can thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / theg pa chen po'i chos
229a5: kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa thams cad rim gyis gzhol zhing shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur
229a6: ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang bral ba dang / lha'i bdud kyi 'khor thams cad dang bral ba dang / mu stegs can gyi 'khor thams cad dang bral ba dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis
229a7: brgyan cing / shin tu mdzes pa dang / yang dag par lta ba dang ldan zhing ngo mtshar dang / bkra shis dang / tshul ngan pa'i lta ba sna tshogs dang / rtag par lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / bdag dang bdag gir lta ba thams cad
229a8: yongs su spangs pa'i sems can dag zhing der skye ste/ shin tu tshe ring ba dang / theg pa chen po'i ro gcig la longs spyod par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu med do// sems can dag cis
229b1: 'dul ba bzhin du chos ston pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing / sems can tshad med pa la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don du ro gcig pa'i chos bstan pa la brtsod pa med pas yongs su
229b2: rgyas par byed cing bgegs dang bar chad med par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po log par lta ba yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor lo bcu pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
229b3: po 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po 'di dang ldan pas nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur/ / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur
229b4: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/ / theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur// theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ro/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongs su 'phel
229b5: ba dang / / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam/ chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung chung ngu na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing sgra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ba dang
229b6: theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang / rno ba'i shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / sa rnams tham
229b7: cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing / phyir mi ldog pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing rjes su slob pa dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan
229b8: thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / chos thos pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems
230a1: mi ngoms pa dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa dang / smon lam dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sems mi ngoms par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gzhan thob pa yang ji skad bshad pa bzhin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
230a2: dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po dang/ dang ldan na myur du blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgabar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snga ma 'das pa'i
230a3: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mi dge ba bcu'i las yongs su spangs nas thams cad kyis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi 'bras bu bsngags shing bstod de/ sems can thams cad la bde ba dang /
230a4: phan pa'i don dang / byang chub kyil pa skye zhing 'phel bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i sdug bsngal lhag ma lus par gsal bar bya ba dang ngan
230a5: so gsum skam par bya ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung bas pa par bya ba dang / khams gsum gyi sri la yangs s+hogacad pang bya ba dang / zung po dang / yas dang / sne chedag cad pang bya ba dang / khrims cad myeng du jigs pa med pa'i myang na las 'da' ba'i grong khyer
230a6: du gzung ba'i phyir ji skad bshad pa bzhin du mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi 'bras bu yongs su spong ngo / / de bas na rigs kyi bu gal te yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di ma bsgrubs par mngon par
230a7: 'tshang rgya ba 'am/ chung ngu na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'ga' tsam yang mi srung ba dang ni theg pa chen po yang dag par spyod pa'o zhe'am/ nga ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
230a8: bsgrub pa'o zhes zer na/ gang zag de ni shin tu brdzun par smra ba ste/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'jig rten slu ba dang / 'dzem pa dang / ngo tsha ba med pa/ stong par smra zhing chad par//
230b1: ba/ glen pa mi shes pa sgrub can yin te/ de'i tshe 'phos nas ngan song du ltung bar shes par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gang tshig tu brjod pa tsam 'am mnyan pa tsam gyis chog ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bsgoms pa
230b2: 'am/ nan tan du bya mi dgos par byang chub dang / mya ngan las 'das pa thob tu zin nA ni bskal pa cig la yud tsam thang cig gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sa'i khams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi sem
230b3: can thams cad byang chub mngon par 'chad rgya ste/ mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur bzhig nga ni de lta bu'i gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi la mni theg pa chen po'i zla ba yin te/ byang chub kyi rgyu dang mya
230b4: ngan las 'da' ba'i thim smras lta bu'o/ / rigs kyi thugal te sems bskyed pa tsam pam sngon lam btab pa tsam gyis chog ste// dge ba bcu'i lngas kyi la mgoms pa nan tan bya mi dgos pa byang chub dang mang
230b5: s u mya ngan las 'da' pa 'thob du zin na ni bskal bcig la yud tsam thang tsog gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sa'i khams kyi rdul pa mo snyed kyi sems can dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu
230b6: tu mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba zhig na de ni de lta bu'i gnas med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'da' ba'i 'bras bu'i khyad par dang
230b7: yon tan gyi rgyud 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu gal te dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan du ma byas na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi bskal par bdag ni theg pa chen po'o zhes
230b8: zer te/ 'chang ngam/ nyan nam/ sems bskyed dam/ smon lam btab kyang byang chub dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba 'thob par mi 'gyur la gzhan yang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las 'don mi nus so// rigs kyi bu
231a1: dge ba bcu'i las kyi las la nan tan byas pas 'jig rten na rgyal rigs dang / bram ze la sogs pa rigs chen po dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched stengs kyi bar
231a2: du yod pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du yang yod par 'gyur te/ de dag kun kyang dge babacu'i las kyi lam la shin tu nan tan/
231a3: byed pa'i khyad par dang bye brag las gyur to// de bas na rigs kyi bu gang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan gyi brgyan gyis rgyan te/ mi
231a4: dge ba bcu'i sdom pa la mi gnas na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ / gang myur du theg pa chen po'i spyod yul du chud par 'dod dam/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod dpa/ myung du dge ba'i tshes thams
231a5: cad yongs su rdzogs par 'dod na sngar dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam shin tu bsrung bar bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis ni dge ba'i chos thams cad dang / yon tan rnam par bzhag
231a6: pa'i gzhi dang / 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'da' ba'i 'bras bu'i mchog thob par byed pa'i rgyu yin no// de bas na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la shin tu nan bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di
231a7: dag gsal bar 'das pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ / srid pa'i sdug bsngal kun gcod cing // byang chub chen po 'thob 'dod pa// dge bcu'i 'khor lo'i nan tan la// le lo ma byed brtson par
231a8: gyis/ / theg pa gsam gyi dam chos dang // theg pa rnam gsum gang zag dang // rab tu byung ba thams cad la// 'khrul ba med par thob par 'gyur// theg chen spyod pa dang mos shing // thams cad 'khor gyi
231b1: dbugs 'byin pa'i/ / chos mchog rtogs nas zhing dag der// byang chub chen po myur du 'thob// gal te srog gcod yongs spangs na// kun gyis bkur zhing bla mar byed// rtag tu nad med tshe yang ring// bde zhing sgyid la gnod pa
231b2: med/ / skye ba'i gnas ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas spyod yul lam la mos// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun mthong // myur du bla med byang chub 'thob// ma byin len pa yongs spangs na// mkhas pas bkur zhing bla
231b3: mar byed/ / 'dod chags skye ba'i lam kun zhi// 'dod chags med pa skye bar 'gyur// skye ba kun tu longs spyod ldan// sbyin bdag chen por de 'gyur te// rin chen mang pos brgyan pa dang // yid 'ong sangs rgyas zhing yang
231b4: 'thob/ / 'dod pas log g.yem yongs spangs na// nyon mongs dri ma zhi bar 'gyur// 'dod chags sred pa'i mtsho yang skems// rnam dag sangs rgyas zhing myur 'thob// sems can rnam pa mang po yang // 'dod pa'i 'dam las/
231b5: 'byin par 'gyur// theg chen la ni rab bkod nas// tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod du btsud// brdzun du smra ba yongs spangs na// 'phags pa'i dbang dang ye shes 'thob// rtag tu bden la smra bar dga'// brdzun du smra ba'i
231b6: sdug bsngal 'jig/ tshig gcig tshad mar btsugs pas na// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun mthong // brdzun mi smra ba bsgoms pas na// byang chub chen po myur du 'thob// phra ma'i tshig smra yongs spangs na// dge ba'i
231b7: chos kyi snod du 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun mthong // chad par lta bar yod mi 'gyur// 'phags pa'i chags med dga' ba dang // rin chen gter gyi gzungs 'thob cing // zab mo chos kyi rgya mtshor rig
231b8: mur du tha med byang chub 'thob/ / gal te zhe gcod tshig spangs te// 'jam zhing gnyen pa'i tshig smras na// sems can kun gyis bskur bar 'gyur// snga ma'i mi dge las kyang zhi// 'khor rnams rtag tu dga' ba dang // bya/
232a1: chub sems dpa'i ston par 'gyur// sangs rgyas mang po'i spyod yul shes// sa bcu las kyang 'da' bar 'gyur// kyal bar smra ba yongs spangs na// mkhas pas bkur zhing bla mar byed// gzhan la tshig/
232a2: tu smra ba kun// yon tan rnam lnga 'thob par 'gyur// rtag tu 'phags pa'i tshig nyan cing // 'phags pa'i lam tshol spro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yongs rdzogs shing // thams cad mkhyen pa myur du 'thob// gal
232a3: te tshigs sems yongs spangs te/ / 'phags pa rnams la mi smod cing // ngur smrig gyon la mchod par byed// theg pa gsum gyi byang chub sgrub// rtag tu rnam dag zhing du skye// ston pa'i gnas su gnas par 'gyur//
232a4: bla med theg pa la zhon te// rgyal ba'i ye shes myur du 'thob// gal te gnod sems yongs spangs te// gcig tu byams pa'i sems bsgoms na// mnyam par bzhag pa'ang myur du 'thob// 'phags pa'i spyod
232a5: yul mos par 'gyur/ / rnam dag sangs rgyas zhing du skye// nyes pa'i skyon rnams kun dang bral// de la gnas na byang chub 'thob// gnod sems thams cad spang par bya// ngan par lta ba yongs spangs te// rna
232a6: dgadad pa'i sems bsgoms na/ / theg gsum ston pa mos byed cing // sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa byed// ngan song gsum las yongs thar te// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rnams dang bred// byang chub sems da
232a7: yon tan ldan/ / ye shes mchog kyang thob par 'gyur// dge ba bcu'i las lam gyis// byang chub mchog thob 'gyur zhes gsungs// snyoms par 'jug dang gzungs rnams dang // sa dang bzod pa skye bar 'gyur
232a8: bdag nyid che ba'i 'khor lo 'angs/ / ngan song thams cad rab bcom nas// sdig pa'i sgrib pa kun kyang choms// myur du byang chub chen po thob// 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po sa'i snying po 'khor lo bcu pa zhes
232b1: bya ba las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o/ / / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing gi sbyin pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa cu
232b2: yod de/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das nas
232b3: nyan thas dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/
232b4: bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyi zas dang / skom dang gos dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / bal glang dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / lus kyi yan lag dang / rkang pa dang / lag pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / mgo/
232b5: dang / mig dang / rkang dang / klad rgyas dang / lpags pa dang / rus pa dang / sha dang / khrag dang / yul dang / sring dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / khang khyim dang / zhing 'brog la sogs pa de
232b6: dag thams cad sbyin pa de re re byed pa na lus dang srog la mi lta zhing bdag gcig pu 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir sems bskyed de/ sbyin pa byed pa ma yin gyi/ sems can
232b7: thams cad la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i myu gu bskyed pa'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed do// thabs mkhas pa dang shes rab mchog skyed pa'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed do// sems
232b8: can thams cad la byams pa chen po phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed do// sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsol ba'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed do// gzhan
233a1: las skrag go snyam pa med pa'i sems dang / brlang ba med pa'i sems dang / phrag dog med pa'i sems dang / ser sna dang zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin no// gang sbyin pa'i dngos po che yang rung
233a2: chung yang rung / chung ngu na zan tshangs cig tsam gyi sbyin pa byas na yang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu la mi re bar sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed do// nyan thos kyi theg pa'i 'bras bu la mi re bar sbyin pa sbyin pa'i
233a3: sems bskyed do/ / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i 'bras bu la mi re bar sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed do// gang sbyin pa'i dngos po de che yang rung / chung yang rung / chung ngun zan changs gcig tsam gyi sbyin pa byas
233a4: na yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su bsngo zhing sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed do/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing gi sbyin pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu
233a5: pa de dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed pa na 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su gsal ba'i phyir nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod
233a6: nams chen po'i zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod cing bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang /
233a7: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed pa ni byams pa dang / snying rje chen po'i sems med kyi bdag gi dbul ba de spong ba dang / bdag sdug bsngal las thar pa dang / bdag bde ba thob par bya/
233a8: ba dang / bdag mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir sbyin pa byed de// sems can thams cad kyi phyir sbyin pa byed pa ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin na ni byams pa dang /
233b1: snying rje chen po'i sems kyis sems can thams cad kyi dbul phongs pa spong ba dang / sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las gdon pa dang / sems can thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad
233b2: mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir sbyin pa byed kyi/ bdag 'ba' zhig gi phyir sbyin pa spyod pa ma yin no// de lta bas na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad shin tu 'das pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad
233b3: kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dag nga sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed cing yongs su srung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
233b4: gang zang zing gi sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa spyod pa na 'dod pa rnam lnga'i mchog la sems mi chags te/ bdag nyid dbang ba bde ba'i yo byad thams cad sems can kun la sbyin par byed de/ sems can thams
233b5: cad yongs su bsdud pa'i sems dang / bdag gi sdug bsngal thams cad la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa'i sems dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba'i sems dang / sems can thams cad/
233b6: la bde ba'i sbyin pa'i sems dang / sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sems la gnas te sbyin pa byed do// de bas na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos
233b7: dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur dang / srung ba byed par 'gyur ro// rigs
233b8: kyi bu gal te 'dod pa lnga la sems mi chags shing byams pa dang / snying rje chen pos sbyin pa byed na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod
234a1: rnams kyi zhing yang dag pa zhes bya'o/ / gal te 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa rnam lnga yang ma spangs la byams pa dang / snying rje chen po yang med par sbyin pa byed na sbyin pa'i dngos po tshad med dpag tu med pa
234a2: btang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes mi bya ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi zhing / yang dag pa yang ma yin pas sbyin pa 'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyi phyag rgyas btab pa
234a3: ma yin no/ / de bas na 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa lnga spangs te/ byams pa dang / snying rje chen po ldan pas sbyin pa bya'o// gal te 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa lnga yang ma spangs la byams pa dang / snying rje chen po yang med par sbyin pa byed na byang
234a4: chub sems dpa'i zhes kyang me bya la bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa yang ma yin no/ / rigs kyi bu 'dod pa rnam lnga la chags pas sbyin pa byed na/ bdag nyid kyi lus kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshwa cung zad kyang ni
234a5: bar mi 'gyur na/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal tshad med pa gsal ba lta ci spos// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// zang zing sbyin pa'i 'khor
234a6: lo ldan pa/ / mkhas pa bsam pa dag pa'i mos pas// 'dod pa rnam lnga dag ni spangs te// sems can kun la phan dang bde byed// sems can kun la bde ba'i phyir gyi// rnam smin 'bras bu de phyir ma yin// sbyin pa'i
234a7: dngos po byin pa chung yang / / yang dag bsod nams zhing du de 'gyur// sbyin pa'i dngos po mang du byas kyang // 'dod pa nam lnga dag la gnas na// 'phags pa dag gi phyag rgyas ma btab// ma nges pa yi tshogs la gnas
234a8: gu re te/ sbyin pa'i dngos po byin pa chung yang // 'dod pa lnga la mi gnas pa ni// nyan thos dag dang rang rgyal ba yi// yang dag bsod nams zhing du de 'gyur// de bas 'dod pa rnam lnga spangs la// rtag tu rnam dag sbyin pa byed
234b1: ci / / sems can kun la bde ba byed na// yang dag bsod nams zhing du de 'gyur// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos kyi sbyin pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu
234b2: y ad de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo de dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bsal ba'i phyir myur du nyi ma'i sgron ma'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
234b3: thob cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams chen po'i zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
234b4: kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bstan pa dam pa'i chos dang nyan thos kyi theg pa
234b5: dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos dang / theg pa chen po dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos dang / 'jig rten gyi chos dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos
234b6: dang / / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos dang / zag pa zad pa'i chos dang / 'dus byas kyi chos dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos dang / gnyis su med pa'i chos rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
234b7: rnam pa bcu po 'di la dad cing dgus par byed pa dang / ji skad thos pa rnams ci nus su gzungs su 'dzin cing yid la byed do// rab tu rtog go// mthar khong du chud par byed cing gzhan dag la yang ci rigs par
234b8: rtog par byed do/ / nam chos ston pa'i tshe na phrag dog med pa'i sems dang / ser sna med pa'i sems dang / nga rgyal med pa'i sems dang rnyed pa mi re ba'i sems dang / gzhan mi smod pa'i sems dang / bdag
235a1: mi stong pa'i sems dang / sti stang bcas pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / byams pa chen po'i sems dang / snying rje chen po'i sems su bya'o// nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi gang zag la ni nyan
235a2: thos kyi chos ston cing 'chad kyi/ de la rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ theg pa chen po'i chos kyis ma yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis theg pa can gyi gang zag la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos ston gyi
235a3: nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos sam/ theg pa chen po'i chos kyi ma yin pa dang / theg pa chen po'i gang zag la ni theg pa chen po'i chos ston gyi/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i chos kyi sa ma yin pa dang
235a4: sems can gyi dbang po dang / snod ji lta ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston gyi/ dbang po dang snod du ma gyur pa la chos mi ston to// gang theg pa chen po'i sems can la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa spyod cig par ngam/
235a5: nyan thos kyi theg pa spyod cig par mi skul lo// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gyi sems can la skabs kha cig tu theg pa chen po'i spyod pa la nan tan byos shig ces bskul ba'i skabs ni yod do// nyan thos
235a6: kyi theg pa can gyi sems can la kha cig tu rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i spyod pa dang / theg pa chen po'i spyod pa la nan tan gyis shig ces skul ba'i skabs kyang yod de// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i dang
235a7: pa chas rlung dun tshigs su bcad pa gcigags/ tsigs bca pa byed kyim la yang shin du steng bzung ci/ de la gyu'am/ shA ba / bgags pas/ bang radus byed / saston pa
235a8: sangs rgyas dang 'dra bar 'du shes pa la/ chos nyan pa'i 'khor rnams land pa dang 'dra bar 'du shes pa dang / gang 'chad pa'i chos la sman bzang po dang 'dra bar 'du shes gang / 'ad pa rnam lnga yongs sugaca
235b1: re ba med pas dam pa'i chos ston to/ / rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi sbyin pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
235b2: po'i gang 'khor lo do dang ldan na 'dod pa lnga yongs su gsal te/ myur du nyi ma'i sgron ma'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang nyan thos dang /
235b3: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de nas
235b4: bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal ba'i bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ / mkhas pa chos kyi sbyin pa spyod pa dag/ snod bzhin theg pa gsum gyi chos snyan te// theg pa gzhan dag
235b5: de la ston ma byed/ / thos nas de la 'phya zhing skur mi 'gyur// dbang po snod bzhin dam pa'i chos ston gyi// dbang po snod min dag la ma yin no// so sor ji ltar ci la mos pa bzhin// de dang de'i chos ston mgu bar
235b6: byed/ / theg pa chen po spyod pa'i gang zag la// theg pa rnam pa gnyis kyi chos mi snyan// bar bar theg pa gnyis kyi gang zag la// theg pa 'bring dang rab kyi chos ston to// shin tu dad cing gus pas chos
235b7: mnyan gyi/ / de la 'phya zhing srung bar mi bya'o// chos smra ba la mchod pa byed pa ni// sangs rgyas 'dra bar de la 'du shes bskyed// kun nas nyon mongs pa yi na pasal phyir// dam pa'i chos kyi sman dganyan
235b8: par bskul/ / khe dang grags pa shin tu ring spangs te// dam pa'i chos dag bstan cing bshad par bya// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims rnam par
236a1: dgapa gos chen po 'khor la yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo dang ldanan// theg pa sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang/
236a2: sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing theg pa chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad
236a3: kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na tshul khrims rnam par dag pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par
236a4: dag pa rnam pa gnyis te/ thun mod pa dang / thun mong pa ma yin no// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i 'khor lo thun mong ba zhe na/ gang khyim na gnas pa dge bsnyen
236a5: pa dang / dge bsnyen ma'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa blangs pa 'am/ yang na rab tu byung ba so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa ste/ sdom pa 'di dang so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims 'di ni byed
236a6: chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i 'khor lo thun mong ba ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba yin no// byang chub sems dpas tshul khrims kyi 'khor lo rnam
236a7: par dag pa 'di'i dbang gis sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa chod par ram/ log par lta ba sel bar ram/ las kyi sgrib pa dang / 'khor ba las grol bar mi 'gyur te/ go cha chen pol
236a8: 'khor lo zhes kyang mi bya/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhir yang dag pa yang ma yin no// de la ji ltar na byang chub
236b1: sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo thun mong ma yin zhe na/ gang byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems dang / gnod pa
236b2: med pa'i sems dang / khon du 'dzin pa med pa'i sems kyis rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims srung ngo // tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims ngan pa can dang / sbyin pa dang / ser sna dang / byams pa dang / zhe
236b3: sdang dang / brtson 'grus dang / le lo can rab 'bring tha ma kun la bye brag mi 'byed pa'i sems dang / khyad par med pa'i 'du shes kyis tshul khrims yongs su bsrung ngo // khams gsum gyi sems can
236b4: thams cad la zhe sdang med pa dang / khong khro ba med pa dang / ngan par spyod pa med pas tshul khrims yongs su srung ngo // srid pa gsum gyi phung po dang / khams dang skye mched la rnam par rtog pa med pas
236b5: tshul khrims yongs su bsrung ngo / / 'dod pa'i khams la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo // gzugs yod pa'i khams la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo // gzugs med pa'i khams la mi gnas
236b6: par tshul khrims srung ngo / / sred pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu thams cad la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo // rnyed pa dang mi rnyed pa la mi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo // 'du byed rnams la mi gnas
236b7: par tshul khrims srung ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo thun mong ma yin pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
236b8: tshul khrims rnam par dag pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas dadod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
237a1: thams cad las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang // bsrung ba dang /
237a2: bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad da bka' stsal pa/ khyim na gnas shing sdom pa len pa// rang byung so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims/
237a3: zab pa gnyis dang thun mang yin te// byang chub chen po zhes ni mi bya// mangs pa stong pa nyid chos sgom pa// 'jig rten kun la mi rten mi gnas// srad pa kun la gnas ma yin par// rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims
237a4: srung ngo / / mtshan ma spong ba'i tshul khrims dag ni// chags pa med de zag pa kun med// tshul khrims 'di lta ba srung ba dag ni// yang dag bsod nams zhing zhes de bya// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
237a5: dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal
237a6: te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'brar ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa
237a7: thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa la mtshan nyid rnam pa gnyis
237a8: te/ / gang zhe na/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi bzod pa zhe na/ de ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i bzod pa ste/ sems can la dmigs pa/ len pa
237b1: dang bcas pa/ mtshan ma dang bcas pa/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu la rten pa bsod nams kyi las la brten te bzod par byed pa'o// gzhan yang bdag gi gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang ro dang / reg byal rten
237b2: nas bzod par byed pa'o/ / jug pa dang bcas pa'i bzod pa ji mi snyam pa'i med pa'i bzod pa dang / mthu zhan pa bzod pa'i sems can gtong ba'i bzod pa dang / g.yodang slar bcas pa'i bzod pa dang / pha rol la
237b3: 'drid pa'i bzod pa dang / sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i don mi byed pa'i bzod pa ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi bzod pa zhes bya ste/ bzod pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
237b4: la sogs pa dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes mi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang ma yin te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad
237b5: kye bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa zhes kyang mi bya'o/ / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzod pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/ zag pa med pa'i bzod pa ste 'phags
237b6: pa thams cad kyi chos chen po'i 'od kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir chags pa med pa'i bzod pa dang / bya ba'i dngos po thams cad dang / tshig tu smra ba dang / rgyu dang mtshan
237b7: ma dang / yig ge dang / sgra skad thams cad yongs su bcad pa'i skye mched la brten pa'i bzod pa spyod do// bzod pa 'di bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs pa gsum dang / bskal pa rnam gsum dang /
237b8: mtshan nyid gsum dang / dus gsum dang / srid pa gsum dang / 'du byed rnam gsum dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum dang / chu bo bzhi dang / nye bar len pa bzhi dang / mdud ba rnam pa ni dang / lus kyi masman ma bzhi la sogs pa yongs
238a1: su bcad pas bzod pa 'di bsgom pa'i tshe sems dang yid rab tu zhi bas 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i nom chen po'i lo 'i zod pa zhes bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
238a2: dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po'i 'khor lo'i bzod pa de dang ldan pas thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa lnga rnams yongs su bsal ba'i phyir byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ / nyan thos
238a3: dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsad nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis
238a4: mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen kur byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sa don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// bzod pa la ni rnam pa gnyis te/ mtshan
238a5: mar bcas dang mtshan ma med pa/ / mtshan mar bcas pa'i bzod pa chags yod// mkhas pa dag ni de la mi bstod// 'du byed nam gsum pang po khams dang // skye mched la rten bzod pa sgom pa// de ni zag
238a6: bcas bzod pa yin te/ / byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma yin// phyin ci log ni rnam bzhi bsal nas// chags pa med pa'i bzod pa sgom zhing // 'du byed rnam pa gsum dag zhin// bzod pa 'di la thams cad
238a7: bstod 'gyur/ / 'du byed thams cad rab tu zhi zhing // rtog pa thams cad yongs su spangs te// sems ni nam mkha' 'dra bar mnyam pa// bzod pa 'di la thams cad bstod 'gyur// thams cad chos la ro gcig/
238a8: 'thun par// stong pa mtshan ma med pa zhi ba// sems ni ci la'ang mi gnas mi chags// bzod pa 'di ni phan don cher 'gyur// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi
238b1: go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
238b2: cad las shin tu 'das pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba
238b3: dang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ / de la ji ltar na brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus la rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten
238b4: las 'das pa'o/ / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i brtson 'grus zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis 'jig rten gyi bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po rnam
238b5: pa gsum la nan tan byed do/ / bsod nams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa byed pa'i bsod nams kyi las dang / tshul khrims bsrung ba bsod nams byed pa'i las dang / bsgom pa'i bsod nams byed pa'i
238b6: las so/ / laso 'di dag byed pa ni brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum zhes bya ste/ brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum po 'di dag ni sems can la dmigs pa zag pa dang bcas pa/ nye bar len pa dang bcas pa/ rnam
238b7: par smin pa'i 'bras bu la rten pa/ bsod nams kyi las la brten pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi brtson 'grus zhes bya'o// brtson 'grus 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
238b8: kyi theg pa la sogs pa dang thun mong yin te/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes mi bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod/
239a1: nams kyi zhing yang dag pa yang ma yin no// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' dag shin tu 'bad pa'i
239a2: brtson 'grus kyis sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis nyon mongs pa'i las dang sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba ste/ brtson 'grus 'di ni 'phags pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa/ zag pa med pa/
239a3: bar len par med pa/ rten dang gnas med de/ brtson 'grus dang / le lo dang / sbyin pa dang / ser sna dang / tshul khrims dang / ngan pa'i tshul khrims can dang / byams pa dang / zhe sdang dang / sems can rab dang / 'bring dang /
239a4: tha ma kun la mi 'byed pa'i sems dang / bye brag med pa'i 'du shes kyis shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom mo// khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / dmigs pa med pas bya ba'i las
239a5: byed de smra ba dang / rtog pa dang / spyod pa'i gnas thams cad la mi gnas pa'i sems kyis shin du 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom mo// srid pa gsum gyi phung po dang / khams dang skye mched/ rnam par rtog pa med
239a6: pas shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ 'dod pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / gzugs yod pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / gzugs med pa'i
239a7: khams la mi gnas pa'i ba ba'i brtson 'grus dang / srid pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu thams cad la mi rtog pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa kun la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang /
239a8: 'du byed rnams la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / 'jig rten gyi bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po gsum la mi gnas pa'i 'bang po'i brtson 'grus dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i bsod
239b1: nams kyi las kyi dngos po rnam pa gsum la mi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po rnam pa gsum la shin tu brtson 'grus rtsom
239b2: pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gang brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen
239b3: bo'i 'khor lor dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bsal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das
239b4: te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de
239b5: nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ / dbang po drug la shin tu chags pa'i// bus pa chu bo lngas ni khyer pa// shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus
239b6: rtsom yang/ / mkhas pa rnams kyis de la smod 'gyur// sems can dmigs shing zag dang bcas la// len par bcas shing brtson 'grus rtsom na// yang dag bsod nams zhing ma yin te// byang chub sems dpa'
239b7: chen po ma yin/ / mkhas pa brtson 'grus rtsom pa dag ni// chags pa thams cad ring du spangs te// sems ni ci la'ang mi gnas mi chags// yang dag bsod nams zhing zhes de bya// ming dang gzugs la
239b8: chags pa med cing / / phung po khams dang skye mched spangs te// thams cad 'khor gyi rten du 'gyur ba// de ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po// 'jig rten spyod kyang chu zla bzhin te// 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus
240a1: tsam pa'i mthar phyin/ / 'khor lo 'di yis yongs su bcom pa// skye bo kun nas nyon mongs bcings pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan
240a2: gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
240a3: cad las shin tu 'das nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyi mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen/
240a4: bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan la rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// de la
240a5: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi bsam gtan zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams phung po la gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / khams la gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang /
240a6: mched la gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / gzugs yod pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la
240a7: gnas nas bsam+b+ha bsgom pa dang / sdom pa gsum la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam par grol ba gsum la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la gnas nas
240a8: bsam gtan sgom pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / dbang po lnga la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa
240b1: dang / / stobs lnga la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sa'i
240b2: khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / chu'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang // me'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rlung gi khams la gnas nas bsam gtan
240b3: sgom pa dang / nam mkha'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / bde ba'i tshor ba la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sdug
240b4: bsngal ba'i tshor ba la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la gnas
240b5: nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye
240b6: mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'jig rten 'di la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes chung ngu la gnas nas bsam gtan
240b7: sgom pa dang / 'du shes chen po la gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / 'du shes tshad med pa la gnas nas bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / bsam gtan de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa nye bar len pa dang bcas pa/
240b8: chags pa dang bcas pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan zhes bya'o// bsam gtan 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang thun mong pa zhes bya ba ste/ go cha chen po'i
241a1: 'khor lo ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes mi bya ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin no// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems
241a2: dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams phung po dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / skye mched dang bral bar
241a3: bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / gzugs kyi khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang bral bar bsamo gtan sgom pa dang
241a4: sdom pa gsum dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam par thar pa gsum dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / yang dag par spong
241a5: ba bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / dbang po lnga dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / stobs lnga dang bral bar bsam
241a6: gtan sgom pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sa'i khams dang bral bar bsam
241a7: gtan sgom pa dang / chu'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / me'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rlung gi khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /
241a8: nam mkha'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / bde bar tshor ba dang bral bar
241b1: bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sdug bsngal du tshor ba dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin par tshor ba dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / nam mkha' mtha'
241b2: yas skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes
241b3: med 'du shes med min skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'jig rten 'di dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes chung ngu dang
241b4: bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes chen po dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes tshad med pa dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa ste/ bsam gtan 'di ni 'phags pa'i 'od zer chen po
241b5: bskyed pa/ zag pa med pa/ nye bar len pa med pa/ chags pa med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
241b6: sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang
241b7: rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang
241b8: bsrung dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ bdag gi khur lci spong ba'i phyir ni// dmigs dang bcas
242a1: pa'i ting 'dzin bsgoms te/ / bdag gi kun nas nyon mongs gcod 'dod// yang dag mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin// snong la rten cing rtag dang bcas pa// rnam par grol 'dod tid 'dzin bsgom yang // tshu ral
242a2: pha rol mu la gnas na/ / sems can dag la phan don byed min// sems can kun la phan dang bde phyir// ting 'dzin sgom zhing khur lci spongs te// kun nas nyon mongs thams cad sel ba// de ni yang dag mkhas pa mtshan
242a3: nyid/ sems can thams cad sim par byed phyir// mi gnas pa'i ting 'dzin sgom ste// 'dod pa'i srid pa thams cad chod pa// de ni blo gros chen po zhes bya// srid pas bcings pa thams cad bkrol te// 'jigs pa med pa'i
242a4: grong du gzung phyir/ / rab tu zhi ba'i ting 'dzin bsgom pa// de ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po'o// / bam po bcu pa ste tha ma// // rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
242a5: rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams ca
242a6: las shin tu 'das shing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang // nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang
242a7: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab la ni
242a8: rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rten gyi dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i shes rab ce na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams theg pa gsum gyi dam pa'i chos klog
242b1: pa dang / 'don pa dang / glegs bam du 'dri ba dang / nyen pa dang / pha rol la ston cing 'chad pa 'ba' zhig la rten te/ sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa sel bar 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi shes/
242b2: rab kyi sgron ma dbyung ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos la shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / glegs bam du 'dri ba dang / gnan
242b3: dag la rgyas par ston cing 'chad pa dang / yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyis nan tan byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi thag pa dang ldan pa'i chos la klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / nyan
242b4: rang / glegs bam du 'dri ba dang / gzhan dag la rgya pang ston mi cad pa dang / yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyis nan tan du spyod do// de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i theg pa chen po dang ldan pa'i chos la brtson 'grus
242b5: su klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / glegs pam du 'dri ba dang / gzhan la yang rgyas par ston cing 'chad pa dang / yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyis nan tan byed ste/ 'phags pa'i zag pa med pa'i lam
242b6: kye yan lag tshol ba ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam tshol ba ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam du rtogs pa'i rnam par grol ba tshol ba ma yin// rab tu zhi ba yang dag pa'i shes rab la nad byed pa ma yin te/ rtag tu lta ba
242b7: rang bcas pa'i/ shes rab dang bcas pa'i shes rab la nan tan byed do// de ltar len pa dang bcas pa/ chags pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi shes rab ces bya'o// shes
242b8: rab de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba yin te/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes mi bya/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs
243a1: rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag par ma yin no/ / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab can 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi/
243a2: lam la brtson 'grus su nan tan byed pa ni/ ci nus su theg pa gsum gyi yang dag pa'i chos la klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / glegs bam du 'dri ba dang / gzhan dag la rgyas par ston cing 'chang
243a3: de la dmigs su med pa'i sbyor ba la gnas te/ mi g.yo ba dang / mi rtog pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa dang / nam mkha' lta bu'i sems dang / rab tu zhi ba'i sems dang / 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa med pa'i
243a4: shes rab dang / chags pa med pa'i sems dang / skye ba dang 'gog pa med pa'i sems dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sems dang / chos mnyam pa nyid kyi sems dang / de bzhin nyid kyi sems dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i
243a5: sems dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sems dang / bdag med pa'i sems dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i sems dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / bzod pa dang / rtog pa dang bral ba'i sems kyis grub pa dang / 'jigs pa med/
243a6: pa'i sa la shin du thabs mkhas pas bde bar gnas pa dang / mi gnas pa mi chags pa'i mchog dam pa'i blo gros kyi sa la thabs mkhas pas bde bar gnas pa ste/ shes rab 'di ni len pa med pa chags pa med pas
243a7: byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog
243a8: ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
243b1: thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
243b2: dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal
243b3: te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg/
243b4: pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/ rigs kyi byabyang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas
243b5: pa la rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i thabs mkhas pa gang yin zhen/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag gi don nam gzhan gyi don
243b6: nam gnyi ga'i don la bdag dang gzhan du rtog cing bzo dang rgyu rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bdag dang gzhan gyi don yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang rang sangs
243b7: rgyas dang / nyan thos la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / pha dang me dang / nad pa dang / nyams thag pa dang / mgon dang / rten med pa dang / gnod pa mang pos sdug bsngal bar gyur pa mthong na/ shin tu thabs
243b8: mkhas pas sgrol zhing bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam bzhis sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ / byang chub sems dpa' de bdag theg pa chen po la gnas pas nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
244a1: pa dang / theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi dbang po yongs su ma smin pa la shin tu pra bzab pa dam pa'i chos ston te/ slob du gzhug pa dang / 'phags pa'i bsam gtan la nan tan
244a2: du byed du gzhug go/ gzhan yang don dam pa'i bden pa bstan te nan tan byed du gzhug pa dang / phyin ci log bzhi las bzlas shing / mi ltung ba'i chos kyi mtshan nyid rig par bya ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gzhos/
244a3: bar bya ba nas/ gzhan yang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam
244a4: yan lag brgyad pa dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / lhag ma ma lus pa'i lam dang / lam gyi 'bras bu'i bar du 'jug par bya ba la mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par byed do// sems can gang khe dang /
244a5: grags pa dang / longs spyod la chags te dbang po rgod pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pa la ni mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang / ma mo klog pa dang / 'don pa byed du gzhug pa dang / sangs rgyas gzhan gyis
244a6: bshad pa las gzhan pa rnam par grol ba dang / 'thun pa'i gtsug lag klog cing 'don du bcug ste/ yongs su smin par byed do// sems can gang sbyin pa byed pa la mi mos pa la ni nor rin po che dang / nor
244a7: dbyig rnam pa sna tshogs gtong bar bskul bas yongs su smin par byed do/ / sems can gang gtum pa mi nges pa'i rang bzhin can la tshangs pa'i gnas gzhi slob du bskul ba dang / sems can gang zhe sdang can la
244a8: bzod pa slob par skul ba dang / sems can gang le lo can la ni brtson 'grus slob par skul ba dang / sems can gang sems g.yeng ba la ni bsam gtan sgom par btul ba dang sems can ga 'tshal ba9/
244b1: shes rab can la ni yang dag pa'i chos ston pas bka' lung brda' sprod cing lung 'bog pa la thabs mkhas pas yongs su smin par byed do// sems can gang dkon mchog gsum la mngon par mdad cing mi gnas pa dang / mi spyod
244b2: pa can la ni dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / dkon mchog gsum la dad ba dang / dge bsnyen pa'i sdom pa bslabs pa dang / dge bsnyen ma'i sdom pa bslabs pas yongs su smin par byed do// gzhan yang
244b3: bzo dang rgyu rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gnas la slob cing spyod du btsud pas yongs su smin par byed do/ / de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten pi shin tu thabs mkhas pa'i ye
244b4: shes kyi rnam pa ni chu klung glang ga'i bye ma snyed pas mad do/ / de ltar yig ge dang / gtsug lag dang / bzo dang / rgyu rtsal gyi las kyi gnas thams cad la lhag pa'i spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / thabs mkhas pa'i
244b5: ye shes kyis mu stegs can dang / ston pa gzhan la zhugs pa thams cad btul ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// thabs mkhas pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
244b6: cad dang thun mong ba yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad gnas pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ thabs mkhas pa spyod pa'i gnas su gyur pa/ shin tu thabs mkhas pa lhun gyis grub pas rtog pa med pa'i phyir ldog pa med
244b7: pa'i chos su gyur pa'o/ / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang ston pa mkhas pa la'ang mi rten/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la'ang mi ltos par 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa la nan tan byed na/ byang
244b8: chub sems dpa' de ni 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pas rmongs pa yin te/ ngan song du ltung bar 'gyur ro// de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shin tu thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes la gzhol zhing gnas par yang mi
245a1: dus la/ thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa yang ma yin no// shin tu thabs mi mkhas pas sems can gyi dbang po dang / spyod pa'i khyad par yang ma shes la/ shin tu thabs mkhas pa la'ang
245a2: mongs par gyur pas nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang // zag pa chen po'i snod ma yin pa dang / theg pa chen po'i dbang por ma smin pa dag la zag pa chen po ston pa dang / sobacigatan na
245a3: dubacug go/ / gang theg pa chen po'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can la ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos ston cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la slob cing nan tan byed
245a4: bcug go/ / gang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos ston cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa la slob cing nan tan byang du bcug go// gang nyan thos kyi theg pa'i
245a5: chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can la ni 'khor ba'i chos la ni bde ba dang dga' bar ston te/ / 'khor ba'i chos la skyo ba spyad par mi ston to// gzhan yang shin tu thabs mkhas pa la rmongs pas sems can gang
245a6: srog gcod pa la dga' ba nas de bzhin du log par lta ba'i bar du mos pa dag la ni shin tu zab pa theg pa chen po'i chos ston te/ de la 'khor ba 'di nas shi 'phos nas pha rol tu skye zhing sdug bsngal gyi 'bras
245a7: bu rnam par smin pa myong ba la skyo zhing 'jigs pa dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos spang ba mi ston to// gzhan yang shin tu thabs mkhas pa la rmongs pas sems can gang tshul khrims srung bar mos pa la ni sbyin pa
245a8: spyod du 'jug go/ / sems can gang bzod pa sgom par mos pa la ni bzod pa spong ba ston cing tshul khrims srung du 'jug go// sems can gang brtson 'grus bsgom par mos pa la ni brtson 'grus spong ba ston cing
245b1: bsnang 'dug/ / sa man gas ga/ la pa mas pa nas pa gnas banam can 'thamal na kyang phyu gag/ mas cadag pa pa mas pan gang sa na/
245b2: cing bsam gtan sgom du 'jug go// de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa la mongs pas yang dag pa jis pa bzhin du sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byang mi nus te/
245b3: sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa'i grogs por gyur to// thabs mkhas pa 'di ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa chags pa dang bcas pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig
245b4: rten gyi thabs mkhas pa zhes bya'o/ / de ltar 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa 'di ni nyan thos dang // rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang thun mong ba yin te/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo ma yin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
245b5: chen po'i zhes kyang mi bya ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin no// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shin tu thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta
245b6: ste byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag gi don btang ste/ / gzhan gyi don lhur byed pas bzo dang sgyu rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par ston pas yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub
245b7: sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / pha dang ma la bsnyen bkur dang / mchod pa byed pa dang / nad pa dang / phongs pa nyams thag pa dang / mgon dang skyabs med pa dang / shin tu sdug bsngal rnam pa mang
245b8: pos gzir ba la thabs kyis sgrol ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhis sems can yongs su smin par byed do// ci la mos pa dang / dbang po dang snod ji lta ba bzhin du sems can la dam pa'i chos ston to// gzhan yang
246a1: rim gyis nyanams kyi theg pa pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la slob cing nan tan byed par sprul ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa ni theg pa chen po la slob cing nan tan byed par sprul ba dang / gal ta nyan/
246a2: thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par dbang po ma smin pa ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi chos kyi skyob sten cing 'khor bas skyo ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba tshol bar stsal lo// sems can gang srog gcod pa la mos pa
246a3: nas log par lta ba'i bar du chags pa la ni dbang po dang / rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du 'khor bar 'khor ba'i chos ston pa dang / 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol du skye ba dang / pha rol gyi sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu myong bar
